Saraswati Vandana.sanskrit:
या कुन्देन्दु तुषार हार धवला या शुभ्रवस्त्रावृता।
या वीणावरदण्डमण्डितकरा या श्वेतपद्मासना॥
Saraswati Vandana.transliteration:
Ya Kundendu Tushara Hara Dhavalā, Ya Shubhra Vastra'vṛtā,
Ya Vīṇā-vara-daṇḍa-maṇḍita-karā, Ya Shveta Padmāsanā.
Saraswati Vandana.english: Salutations to Goddess Saraswati, fair as jasmine, the moon, or snow, adorned in white garments, holding the veena, seated on a white lotus.
